content.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s LedgeCut33 was featured in the January 2013 issue of Architectural Record. In a product review section, the article states that LedgeCut33 installs with a clean, dry stack application that creates instant visual appeal.

excerpt.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s LedgeCut33 was featured in the January 2013 issue of Architectural Record. In a product review section, the article states that LedgeCut33 installs with a clean, dry stack application that creates instant visual appeal.
